moodleQuiz 0.1.0 ðŸŽ“ ðŸŽ‰

A high-level data manipulation R package ðŸ“¦ for cleaning, encoding, filtering, and combining studentâ€™s score and responses from Moodle Quiz report.

Main Functions

4 main functions are:

  • check_sub(): check studentâ€™s submission of the Moodle quiz report by looking at the state column.
  • combine_resp(): combine studentâ€™s responses (Response x) from the Responses report.
  • count_resp(): count how many responses each student answered from the Responses report.
  • combine_grades(): filter, adjust, and combine studentâ€™s grade from Grade/xx column.

Quiz Attributes

  • get_quiz_attr(): to get meta-information from Moodle Quiz report

Helpers

  • clean_moodle(): clean Moodle Quiz report

  • get_report_type(): check types of Moodle Quiz report whether it is Grades or Responses report.

Example Data

  • grades_ls: Moodle Grades Report Example

  • responses_ls: Moodle Responses Report Example
